author: AP
title: Conspiracy theorists burn 5G towers claiming link to coronavirus
description: Some 50 fires targeting cell towers and other equipment have been reported in Britain this month; some 16 have been torched in the Netherlands, with attacks also reported in Ireland, Cyprus, and Belgium
content:
The CCTV footage from a Dutch business park shows a man in a black cap pouring the contents of a white container at the base of a cellular radio tower. Flames burst out as the man jogs back to his Toyota to flee into the evening.
Its a scene thats been repea… [+4999 chars]
